DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to show that Hemospray is effective in achieving initial hemostasis and documenting rate of further bleed when compared to standard of care.
DOC.brief_title: Hemostasis of Active Gastrointestinal (GI) Luminal Tract Bleeding
DOC.criteria: Bleeding peptic ulcer Patient is: < 18 years of age Patient is unable to consent Patient is contraindicated to undergo endoscopy Patient has: coagulopathy, altered post surgical anatomy of the stomach, previously placed intrahepatic portosystemic shunt Patient is pregnant or lactating Patinet has an INR > 2.5
